title: False headline claims Okorocha pledged to help Atiku win at Nigerian election tribunal
subtitle: Peoples Democratic Party
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
claims Imo State governor Rochas Okorocha has pledged to help Abubakar win at the tribunal. Okorocha was an APC senatorial candidate in the election. He

was also posted on the

where it has been

Am Sure Atiku Will Win At The Tribunal, I Will Make Case Easy For Him, By Bringing Out Imo State Original Vote, Everyone Will Feel My Pain – Okorocha”.

But there is not a single mention of Okorocha in the 11-paragraph story.

to Abubakar’s spokesperson responding to allegations that his campaign hacked the database of the Independent National Electoral Commission. It also says the politician’s lawyers “

boasted that they had enough evidence to overturn the presidential election in their client’s favour”.

But there’s no quote by Okorocha or reference to him

easing the way for Abubakar at the election tribunal.

This indicates that the article is essentially

content published for the sole purpose of attracting as many visitor clicks as possible.

This practice is not uncommon on websites such as

Though Okorocha has had

There is no evidence Okorocha has fallen out with Buhari and now supports Abubakar and the PDP. –
